dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset contains 60,000 fully-annotated color images of 32 × 32 from 10 object classes, with 6,000 images for each class. The provided test set is used as the query set, while the remaining images serve as the training set and database.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: R. Uetz
S. Behnke
dcterms:description: The LabelMe-12-50k dataset consists of 50,000 fully annotated color images of 256 × 256 from 12 object classes. The dataset is a subset of the LabelMe dataset, where the object class of the largest label value is chosen as the image label.
dcterms:title: LabelMe-12-50k

dcterms:creator: J. Xiao
K. A. Ehinger
J. Hays
A. Torralba
A. Oliva
dcterms:description: The SUN397 dataset contains approximately 108,000 fully annotated color images from 397 scene categories. A subset of 42 categories with more than 500 images per category is selected to construct a dataset of approximately 35,000 images.
dcterms:title: SUN397
